doc.field: Programs: "People's Unity Rally," welcoming returned veterans from Spain, Cleveland, OH, Jan 22, 1939; "Homenaje a los veteranos de la Brigada Lincoln," Casa de España, New York, NY, Nov 1986 Records: Communist Party assessments of returned Ohio SCW veterans (photocopies): 1939 Flyers: US Committee for a Democratic Spain(1978); "Return to Spain" trip organized by Center for International Studies and Estudios Historicos de la Guerra Civil Española(1983) Clippings re: Communist Party of Ohio; Cuba; Ernest Hemingway; "Fascist propaganda"; William Herrick; Oliver Law; Monument to American Volunteers in Spain (Spanish Civil War Historical Society); Ronald Radosh; Francisco Garcia Salve; "Spain's Heroism – Lesson in the Fight Against Aggression," JB (1939); USSR press releases re: Spain (1977-1979)
